thread.title: Bill Ferreira Joins Graham Curtin
thread.title_full: Bill Ferreira Joins Graham Curtin - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Bill Ferreira Joins Graham Curtin
text:
Graham Curtin , P.A.
MORRISTOWN, N.J. , Oct. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Bill Ferreira, a recognized leader in New Jersey and national bar associations, has joined Graham Curtin as a member of the firm's Corporate & Commercial practice group. In his Of Counsel role, he will focus his practice in the areas of business law and general commercial matters, real estate and international law.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151007/275092
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151007/275091LOGO
Prior to joining Graham Curtin , Ferreira was the Principal of Ferreira Law , LLC, a private commercial law firm in Morristown. Ferreira has previously served as Managing Partner of Ferreira & Herbert Law Group, LLC in Englewood, New Jersey . "We are very excited to have Bill join the firm," said Graham Curtin managing partner Peter Laughlin . "Bill is an outstanding lawyer committed to the needs of his clients. He is well-known to attorneys throughout New Jersey and the country due to his leadership roles with state and national bar associations."
Ferreira is well established as a leader of the profession. He recently served as a member of the Board of Governors of the American Bar Association (ABA). He is currently Vice Chair of the ABA's Law Practice Division. Ferreira is active in the New Jersey State Bar Association (NJSBA), the Hispanic National Bar Association (HNBA), the Hispanic Bar Association of New Jersey (HBANJ), and the Cuban American Bar Association (CABA). He previously served as the Chairman of the Board of the Morris County Hispanic-American Chamber of Commerce.
A graduate of Barry University in Miami, Florida and the Seton Hall University School of Law in Newark, New Jersey , Ferreira is admitted to practice law in New York , New Jersey and the Federal Courts. He resides in Morris County with his wife, Vicky, and two children, Charles and Thomas.
About Graham Curtin
Graham Curtin is a full-service law firm with its principal office conveniently located in Morristown, New Jersey . For a complete list of attorneys and practice areas, please visit www.grahamcurtin.com .
